title: Butterfly
lyrics: Butterfly, butterfly, you got a long way to go
Darling, just take it slow
No need to speed along alone
And now what if I, what if I
Taught you the things I know
Would you believe it all?
Just wait and see
Sit and ponder over life and what it is sometimes
I hope that one day I raise kids whether or not they are mine
It sounds weird but I'm scared of being infertile
Think all addiction and abuse can take it's toll after a while
But if you're my blood, my daughter, my son, or adopted child
Everyday will be dedicated to makin' you smile
Raisin' you the way I was raised
Encouraging passion, creativity is escape
Remember I said it that love is everything
Words to live by, don't be afraid to cry
Smile at strangers, but don't always take your dad's advice
'Cause i'm not always right
And love your mother, she's the reason why we're both alive
And that's right, my little
Butterfly, butterfly, you got a long way to go
Darling, just take it slow
No need to speed along alone
And now what if I, what if I
Taught you the things I know
Would you believe it all?
Just wait and see
Don't you forget about me
Forget about me
Uh
Walkin' through the city, I
Carry feelings with me, I
Some of them is full of holes, some of them is empty, I
Some of them is splendid souls, dedicated genocide
Solution, nobody knows, point the finger, close your eyes
I jump on the mirror ways, and throw all my friends away
Just for you to reciprocate and trust in me sincerely
Role model ain't no model if there's only a frame
It's what's inside, that heart following love in those veins
I still see child in me, that's my only vile in me
Therefor me is just like you, we both young, wild, and free
What I feed off, you feed off, and the whole world can see y'all
I see y'all as my little brother, could evolve, we evolve like
Butterfly, butterfly, you got a long way to go
Darling, just take it slow
No need to speed along alone
And now what if I, what if I
Taught you the things I know
Would you believe it all?
Just wait and see
Don't you forget about me
